name: Margaret's Little Shop of Wonders
description:
Fullscreen is recommended for web version

Join Margaret in her little botanic shop ! Take care of the plants to complete your customer’s special orders. A magical and family friendly adventure awaits.

This game was created as part of the Ludum Dare 46 game jam, the theme was “Keep it alive”.

Link to the LDJAM entry : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/margarets-little-shop-of-wonders

Team:
Zyow - Dev
Catty - Graphics
Junemarsh - Graphics
Myoxus - Graphics
GabeTeaRose - Audio

Updates :
v1.00 - Original build for the LudumDare 46 Jam
v1.01 - Fixed a little bug that prevented the player to go to the next level.
